Source: al Qaeda and the Taliban terrorists

text: Far from being treated inhumanely , the al Qaeda and the Taliban terrorists are better fed , better clothed and better cared for than they would be if they were still roaming the cold caves of Afghanistan . They eat three nutritious meals a day , including halal , cereal and granola bars . They enjoy their own large cell , talking freely with one another , worshiping with a prayer leader , and writing home .
